alert.note: Alert for Osage; Pawnee (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 02 at 6:00PM CDT until May 02 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Southwestern Osage County in northeastern Oklahoma... Northwestern Pawnee County in northeastern Oklahoma... * Until 645 PM CDT. * At 600 PM CDT, a confirmed tornado was located 4 miles north of Morrison, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Weather spotters confirmed tornado. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations in or near the path include... Pawnee... Cleveland... Ralston... Blackburn... Skedee... TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
